argument.description: An expression that returns a built-in character, binary, or graphic string, or a Boolean value.

description: The CHARACTER_LENGTH function returns the length, in the specified string unit, of an expression.
sample:
SELECT CHARACTER_LENGTH(NAME, CODEUNITS32)
   FROM T1 WHERE NAME = 'Jürgen'

   SELECT CHARACTER_LENGTH(NAME, CODEUNITS16) 
   FROM T1 WHERE NAME = 'Jürgen'
